transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir good morning main Ishwaray baat kar raha tha Sonia ka manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Kahan se?
Executive: IndiaMART se sir Sonia ka manager.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kinematic engineering mein baat ho rahi hai na?
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan wo actually kal sir aapki baat hui hogi na Sonia se service vagaira ko regarding.
Executive: To mere khyal se aapka feedback bhi aaya tha ki char panch mahine ho gaye aapke account ko aap use bhi kar rahe ho service but koi business convert nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Right? To main wahi account aapka na go through kiya tha kal jab aapka feedback aaya tha to isliye fir abhi aaj call kiya aapko isme major issue kya buyer mana kar de raha hai ya buyer baat hi nahi kar raha hai exact kya problem hai?
Customer: Aap sir jab inquiry yani mujhe aata hai na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Sir kisi ka paanch yes ka jo aata hai.
Customer: To lamba lamba aata hai ek Assam se hai paschim bangal se hai main Maharashtra mein hun.
Executive: Okay to pehla to location ka issue hai.
Customer: Nahi suniye.
Customer: Mera jo compressor hai wo ek HP ke leke do HP tak hai.
Customer: Ye do HP aur aadha HP vagaira ka compressor jo hai main 100 kilometer circle mein bech sakta hun affordable hai transportation matlab customer ko aur mujhe bhi.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Abhi kya ho raha hai ki jo requirement aata hai ek HP ka agar requirement mujhe wo price range uska hai 13000 aur 15000.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Price range hai 13000 15000 ek do HP ka.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Wo agar compressor mujhe paschim bangal mein bhejna hai to feasible nahi hai.
Executive: Samajh gaya.
Customer: Matlab 10 mein se saat aath inquiry aisa rehta hai.
Executive: Okay jahan par wo location obviously nahi jayega iska hoga.
Customer: Haan abhi nazdeek mein jo hai nazdeek mein rahega hum log call karte hain.
Customer: Usme ka genuine inquiry abhi tak mujhe mila nahi.
Customer: Matlab aisa hai ki bhai just price puchne ke liye leke the.
Customer: Aisa sab chal raha hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aur mera jo marginal jahan pe main pan India business karna chahta hun wo screw compressor ka to mujhe ek bhi requirement aaya nahi hai abhi talak.
Executive: Okay to ye jo reciprocating air compressor hai ye to specific location wise ho gaya.
Executive: But jo hamara screw air compressor hai ye aap all over India kar sakte ho but iska nahi aaya.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Matlab mujhe dikhta hai ha notification bhi aata hai screw compressor 10 HP.
Customer: Main notification pe hi jabhi click karta hun to andar ja ke kuch alag hi rehta hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aisa bahut baar hota hai.
Executive: Samajh gaya.
Customer: Aur ye jaise aap daily use karte ho ye jo notification aate hain usi ke basis pe hi karte ho majorly.
Customer: Haan jaise hi mujhe aaya notification main click kar diya.
Customer: Main wo chodta nahi hun kyunki andar ja ke wahi dekhna hai to pehle hi dekhiye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To baad mein abhi main dheere dheere wo dekhna chod diya abhi ek HP rehta hai kya dekhe fayda nahi hai aage ja ke.
Executive: Samajh gaya pura.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai aap aaj abhi subah ke alava kisi aur time bhi free milenge paanch saat minute?
Customer: Nahi nahi sham ko abhi bhi main gadi chala raha hun iske liye baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Achcha tabhi aap kar paye sham ko kitne baje?
Customer: Sham ko 5:00 baje.
Executive: Theek hai main na ek baar na abhi aapka pura account go through dobara kar le raha hun samajh gaya kyunki abhi tak ye issue nahi samajh mein aaya tha theek hai abhi tak to ye lag raha tha ki lead aap use kar rahe ho to aisa buyer kya bol raha hai kyunki lead to aapne kafi use kari but ab ek baar na screw air compressor ko chod ke baki ke product ko Maharashtra level par aur screw air compressor category ko all India level pe iska ek baar main data analysis nikal ke aapko fir sham ko connect karke batata hun ki ye kaise solve hoga.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Main sahi samjha na screw all India baki sare local state.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Hai na?
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay theek hai sir main connect karta hun.
summary:
Concerns:

- No business conversion despite using the service.

- Receives inquiries from distant locations.

- Most inquiries are just for price checking.

- No requirements for screw compressors.

- Notification shows different details upon clicking.



Resolution:

- Executive will analyze data and connect in evening.

- Will analyze data for Maharashtra level products.

- Will analyze data for all India level screw compressors.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer in evening.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, screw compressor, inquiry
